description:
The 2nd match of the district preliminaries is finally entering the final inning!
In the top of the 7th inning, Fuurin Middle allows Seiwa Middle to widen the gap further by scoring another run.
However, thanks to Nishina, who was suddenly put onto the mound, Fuurin narrowly makes it through this tight spot.
However, their #4 Anita had just hurt her wrist...
Seiwa`s battery, Urabe and Andy, keep pitching inside to attack her weak spot.
Source: crunchyroll
